title: Consistent Revenue Growth On The Path To Profitability
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: As the cannabis industry matures, investors are looking for companies that are either already profitable (only a couple fit the bill) or at least on the right path. Barry Fishman, CEO at Vivo Cannabis, talks to Rena Sherbill about their path to profitability, focusing on Canada, Germany and Australia and his view on the necessity of debt. We also cover what they look for in M&A targets, why they're not focusing on the US, social equity in the industry, and the challenges COVID brings. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
